item.title: Sql Practices Orm Vs Plain Sql
item.author: han@d.foundation (Han Ngo)
item.description: The Definition Raw: make all query by self from scratch ORM: Object relational mapping: programing technique for converting data between incompatible type systems using OOP SQL Generator: utility sql tool for generate Entity model, query. Factors that affects the technique decision Productivity: spend time for development and maintain. Work with many different DB system, can replace in future Security: SQL injection Performance Practice Use ORM for almost case, with DEEP understanding the library.
